[Page Title: Menu — Heavy's Barburger]

OUR MENU

View our full food menu and drink selection - it’s full of all things you love, from our famous Barburger and Jumbo Wings to our Fresh Salads and Shorty Margarita.
Menu offerings vary by location! Check your local Heavy’s for location-specific menu & pricing. For catering party trays, click here . Charleston Menu Daniel Island Menu 
Shareable Snacks

Comes with One Dipping Sauce..
Additional Sauces +$1 each 
Our Crispy Wings Tossed in Choice of Red Ranger Sauce, The Wright Sauce, or Lemon Pepper Dry Rub. Buttermilk Ranch for Dipping. Served with Carrots & Celery.
HEAVY’S JUMBO WINGS SIX / TEN RGF 
Four Jumbo Tenders, Buttermilk-Dipped, Hand-Breaded & Fried. Honey Mustard for Dipping.
CHICKEN TENDERS & FRIES Dunked in Red Ranger Sauce for +$1 
Viv’s Deviled Eggs & Heavy’s Sweet & Spicy Thick-Cut Bacon
BACON & EGGS GF 
House-Made Hand-Cut Sweet Onion Rings. Served with Heavy’s Sauce and Sweet & Sassy BBQ for Dipping.
ONION RINGS BASKET / HEAVY BASKET 
Heavy’s Sandwiches

Crispy Fried Chicken Breast Dipped in Spiked-Up Cayenne Sauce, Topped with Pepper Slaw and Pickles
THE RED RANGER 
Grilled Chicken Breast with Pepper Jack Cheese, Avocado, Lettuce, Tomato, Red Onion and Duke's Mayo on a Martin's Potato Bun
THUNDERBIRD 
Fish Filet Dusted with our Rub and Seared on a Cast Iron Skillet, Topped with Lettuce, Tomato, Red Onion and Heavy’s Sauce
ST. JOE BLACKENED FISH 
Fresh Local Tomatoes, Applewood Smoked Bacon, and Fresh Lettuce with Duke’s Mayo on Normandy Farm Sourdough
HEAVY’S BLT (SEASONAL) 
Slow-Roasted Prime Rib, Sliced Thin and Piled High on a Toasted French Loaf. Served with House-Made Jus for Dipping and The Wright Sauce.
BIG TIM’S PRIME RIB 
Salads & Soups

Hand-Breaded Chicken on Fresh Greens with Cheddar, Cucumbers, Tomatoes, Bacon, Toasted Almonds, and Crunchy Sweet Potato Straws with a Side of Heavy’s Honey Mustard||
FRIED CHICKEN SALAD RGF Sub: Chicken Salad +$1 Grilled Chicken +$2 Barburger Patty +$1 | Blackened Fish +$5 
Roasted Chicken, Chilled, Sliced, and Tossed with Fresh Greens, Avocado, Diced Tomatoes, Toasted Almonds, Roasted Corn, Sweet Dates, Crumbled Goat Cheese, Cornbread Croutons, and Our Lemon Vinaigrette
THE COMPANY SALAD GF 
Fresh Romaine Hearts Tossed in Our House-Made Caesar with Fresh Baked Sourdough Croutons, Topped with a Grilled Chicken Breast and Grated Parmesan
GRILLED CHICKEN CAESAR RGF 
Brisket, Short-Rib, Kicked-Up with Sautéed Onions, Peppers, Stewed Tomatoes, and Beans. Topped with Cheddar & Jalapeños.
STEW’S CHILI CUP / BOWL RGF 
We griddle-cook each of our quarter-pound smashburgers to order with our blend of ground Angus beef and serve ‘em on a Toasted Sesame Bun.Double Patty, American Cheese, Sliced Tomato, Red Onion, Lettuce, Pickles, Heavy’s Sauce
BARBURGER 
American Cheese, Red Onion, Pickles, Duke’s Mayo, French’s Mustard
LUTEN’S CHEESEBURGER 
Thick-Cut Bacon, Pepper Jack Cheese, Grilled Onions, Pickled Jalapeños, Sweet & Sassy BBQ, Fried Onion Straws
UNCLE GENE’S RANCHERO 
American & Swiss, Grilled Onions, Pickles, Heavy’s Sauce on Griddled Texas Toast
PATTY MELT 
Marinated Mushrooms, Caramelized Onions, Swiss Cheese, Duke’s Mayo
FUN GUY 
Stew’s Chili, Grilled Onions, Cheddar Cheese, French’s Mustard on a Toasted Martin’s Potato Bun
STEW’S CHILI & CHEESE BURGER 
House-Made Veggie Patty, Swiss Cheese, Sliced Tomato, Red Onion, Lettuce, Pickles, Duke’s Mayo on a Toasted Martin’s Potato Bun
HIPPIE BURGER 
Heavy’s Sides

Add to any sandwich or burger.
CRINKLE CUT FRY RGF SWEET POTATO FRY GF HEAVY’S COLESLAW GF CUP OF STEW’S CHILI RGF LIL RANCH SALAD GF 
We Have Pie!

Made In-House with Fresh Lemons and Limes in a Graham Cracker and Almond Crust with House-Made Whipped Topping
LEMON LIME ICEBOX PIE 
Heavy-Handed Pours

El Jimador Reposado, Agave Nectar, Orange, Fresh Squeezed Lime.
SHORTY MARGARITA GF Add: Grand Marnier float +$3 
Top Shelf Margarita with Patron Silver, Cointreau, Fresh Lime & Grand Marnier Side Piece
ELECTRA 225 GF 
A tad on the sweet side. Bulleit Bourbon, Angostura, Maple, Orange, and a good Cherry
OUR BEST OLD FASHIONED GF 
Frozen Tequila Sunrise-ish
THE BANDWAGON GF 
Served Very Cold! Wild Turkey 101, Cherry & Rosemary Syrup, Fresh Squeezed Lemon
CHERRY BOMB MANHATTAN GF 
Deep Eddy Lime Vodka, Ginger Beer, Lime
MULE NAMED EDGAR GF 
Jasper Gin, Ancho Reyes, Honey, Fresh Squeezed Lemon
BEE STING 
Appleton Estates Rum, Plantation Pineapple Rum, Grand Marnier, Orgeat, Bitters, Fresh Squeezed Orange and Pineapple Juice
HEY KOOL-AID MAN! GF

Amethyst Lemon Cucumber Serrano, Agave, Lime, Lemon, Orange
GOOD GIRL DAISY GF 
Amethyst Blueberry Ginger Mint & Lois’s Lemonade

Soft Drinks

Gluten-Friendly*

Request Gluten FriendlyGluten Friendlyon any Burger/Sandwich +$3on any Burger/Sandwich +$1
RGF = GF = Sub Gluten Free Bun Sub Lettuce Wrap *Prepared in a shared kitchen. Not recommended for celiac or severe gluten allergy.
